author: max
name: Lockdown
install_msg:
Thanks for installing.
<https://github.com/ltzmax/maxcogs/tree/master/lockdown/README.md> for documentation.
If you enjoy my work, you can donate at [buymeacoffee](<https://buymeacoffee.com/ltzmax>)
description: Let moderators lockdown a channel to prevent messages from being sent.
short: Let moderators lockdown a channel to prevent messages from being sent.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any End User Data.
